turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order a coffee from Starbucks on 132 East Holly in Bellingham.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. What would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a decaf cappuccino.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what kind of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like fat free milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Would you like any sweetener in that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I've ordered you a Grande fat free decaf cappuccino. Would you like anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I'd like a blueberry scone.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm sorry, but there are no more blueberry scones today. Can I get you something else instead?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I'd like a piece of pumpkin bread.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Would you like that warmed up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Would you like anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Your decaf cappuccino and pumpkin bread will be ready in five minutes at Starbucks on 132 East Holly. Do you need directions to the store?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. I've sent your receipt to your mobile device.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.
